EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2016-02-10 Cloudistics & VMTurbo.EMAIL-Follow Up Missed
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You! Watch the Cloudistics Turbine & VMTurbo, Public Cloud Performance, Privately Webinar!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Sorry we missed you at our Containers, Microservices and Latency, Oh My! webinar last Thursday! We get it, things come up and days get busy. Fear not though, for there is a recording of the webinar that you can view at your leisure.
You can find the recording here
You can also find the slide deck here <http://vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/ContainersMicroservicesAndLatency.pdf>. Please reach out to your account representative or our Evaluation Team <mailto: evalteam@vmturbo.com> if you have any questions!
-The VMTurbo Team
